variant.figure: WORKSHOP PROGRAM Friday, July 11 9:00-9:15 Welcome 9:15 - 9:40 Outline of the International Standard Linguistic Annotation Framework Nancy Ide and Laurent Romary 9:40 - 10:20 From concrete to virtual annotation mark-up language: the case of COMMOn-REFs Renata Vieira, Caroline Gasperin, Rodrigo Goulart and Susanne Salmon-Alt 10:20-10:50 Coffee Break 11:00 - 11:40 Ontology-based linguistic annotation Philipp Cimiano and Siegfried Handschuh 11:40 - 12:20 Putting FrameNet Data into the ISO Linguistic Annotation Framework Srinivas Narayanan, Miriam R. L. Petruck, Collin F. Baker and Charles J. Fillmore 12:30-14:00 Lunch 14:00 - 14:40 RDF Instantiation ofISLE/MILE Lexical Entries Nancy Ide, Alessandro Lenci and Nicoletta Calzolari 14:40 - 15:20 Parmenides: an opportunity for ISO TC37 SC4?
